scripts.transpile: babel src --nonStandard true --loose all --modules ignore -o dist/app.js && cp ./index.html ./dist
scripts.babelify: browserify ./src/Main.js -o ./dist/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --comments false ] && cp ./index.html ./dist && cp ./styles.css ./dist
scripts.reload: watchify -t babelify -p browserify-hmr ./src/Main.js -o ./dist/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --comments false ] && cp ./index.html ./dist && cp ./styles.css ./dist
